name: claude-delegator-multi
tagline: Delegate to AI experts on Codex, Gemini, or Grok
description: Multi-provider AI expert delegation for Claude Code. Delegate complex tasks to 10 specialized experts running on OpenAI Codex, Google Gemini, or xAI Grok. Features manual selection for full control over expert and model choice.
features: 10 specialized AI experts (Architect, Security Analyst, Web Designer, etc.)
3 AI providers (OpenAI Codex, Google Gemini, xAI Grok)
Manual expert and model selection for full control

pricing.note: Plugin is free. API costs apply based on provider usage.

providers.codex: OpenAI account with Codex CLI access
